24.english: of Jashub, the family of the Jashubites; of Shimron, the family of the Shimronites.

25.hebrew: אֵלֶּה מִשְׁפְּחֹת יִשָּׂשכָר, לִפְקֻדֵיהֶם--אַרְבָּעָה וְשִׁשִּׁים אֶלֶף, וּשְׁלֹשׁ מֵאוֹת.  {ס}
25.english: These are the families of Issachar according to those that were numbered of them, threescore and four thousand and three hundred. {S}

26.hebrew: בְּנֵי זְבוּלֻן, לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָם--לְסֶרֶד מִשְׁפַּחַת הַסַּרְדִּי, לְאֵלוֹן מִשְׁפַּחַת הָאֵלֹנִי; לְיַחְלְאֵל--מִשְׁפַּחַת, הַיַּחְלְאֵלִי.
26.english: The sons of Zebulun after their families: of Sered, the family of the Seredites; of Elon, the family of the Elonites; of Jahleel, the family of the Jahleelites.

27.hebrew: אֵלֶּה מִשְׁפְּחֹת הַזְּבוּלֹנִי, לִפְקֻדֵיהֶם--שִׁשִּׁים אֶלֶף, וַחֲמֵשׁ מֵאוֹת.  {ס}
27.english: These are the families of the Zebulunites according to those that were numbered of them, threescore thousand and five hundred. {S}

28.hebrew: בְּנֵי יוֹסֵף, לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָם--מְנַשֶּׁה, וְאֶפְרָיִם.
28.english: The sons of Joseph after their families: Manasseh and Ephraim.

29.hebrew: בְּנֵי מְנַשֶּׁה, לְמָכִיר מִשְׁפַּחַת הַמָּכִירִי, וּמָכִיר, הוֹלִיד אֶת-גִּלְעָד; לְגִלְעָד, מִשְׁפַּחַת הַגִּלְעָדִי.
29.english: The sons of Manasseh: of Machir, the family of the Machirites--and Machir begot Gilead; of Gilead, the family of the Gileadites.

30.hebrew: אֵלֶּה, בְּנֵי גִלְעָד--אִיעֶזֶר, מִשְׁפַּחַת הָאִיעֶזְרִי; לְחֵלֶק, מִשְׁפַּחַת הַחֶלְקִי.
30.english: These are the sons of Gilead: of Iezer, the family of the Iezerites; of Helek, the family of the Helekites;

31.hebrew: וְאַשְׂרִיאֵל--מִשְׁפַּחַת, הָאַשְׂרִאֵלִי; וְשֶׁכֶם, מִשְׁפַּחַת הַשִּׁכְמִי.
31.english: and of Asriel, the family of the Asrielites; and of Shechem, the family of the Shechemites;

32.hebrew: וּשְׁמִידָע, מִשְׁפַּחַת הַשְּׁמִידָעִי; וְחֵפֶר, מִשְׁפַּחַת הַחֶפְרִי.
32.english: and of Shemida, the family of the Shemidaites; and of Hepher, the family of the Hepherites.

33.hebrew: וּצְלָפְחָד בֶּן-חֵפֶר, לֹא-הָיוּ לוֹ בָּנִים--כִּי אִם-בָּנוֹת:  וְשֵׁם, בְּנוֹת צְלָפְחָד--מַחְלָה וְנֹעָה, חָגְלָה מִלְכָּה וְתִרְצָה.
33.english: And Zelophehad the son of Hepher had no sons, but daughters; and the names of the daughters of Zelophehad were Mahlah, and Noah, Hoglah, Milcah, and Tirzah.

34.hebrew: אֵלֶּה, מִשְׁפְּחֹת מְנַשֶּׁה; וּפְקֻדֵיהֶם, שְׁנַיִם וַחֲמִשִּׁים אֶלֶף וּשְׁבַע מֵאוֹת.  {ס}
34.english: These are the families of Manasseh; and they that were numbered of them were fifty and two thousand and seven hundred. {S}

35.hebrew: אֵלֶּה בְנֵי-אֶפְרַיִם, לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָם--לְשׁוּתֶלַח מִשְׁפַּחַת הַשֻּׁתַלְחִי, לְבֶכֶר מִשְׁפַּחַת הַבַּכְרִי; לְתַחַן, מִשְׁפַּחַת הַתַּחֲנִי.
35.english: These are the sons of Ephraim after their families: of Shuthelah, the family of the Shuthelahites; of Becher, the family of the Becherites; of Tahan, the family of the Tahanites.

36.english: And these are the sons of Shuthelah: of Eran, the family of the Eranites.

37.hebrew: אֵלֶּה מִשְׁפְּחֹת בְּנֵי-אֶפְרַיִם לִפְקֻדֵיהֶם, שְׁנַיִם וּשְׁלֹשִׁים אֶלֶף וַחֲמֵשׁ מֵאוֹת; אֵלֶּה בְנֵי-יוֹסֵף, לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָם.  {ס}
37.english: These are the families of the sons of Ephraim according to those that were numbered of them, thirty and two thousand and five hundred. These are the sons of Joseph after their families. {S}

38.hebrew: בְּנֵי בִנְיָמִן, לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָם--לְבֶלַע מִשְׁפַּחַת הַבַּלְעִי, לְאַשְׁבֵּל מִשְׁפַּחַת הָאַשְׁבֵּלִי; לַאֲחִירָם, מִשְׁפַּחַת הָאֲחִירָמִי.
38.english: The sons of Benjamin after their families: of Bela, the family of the Belaites; of Ashbel, the family of the Ashbelites; of Ahiram, the family of the Ahiramites;

39.hebrew: לִשְׁפוּפָם, מִשְׁפַּחַת הַשּׁוּפָמִי; לְחוּפָם, מִשְׁפַּחַת הַחוּפָמִי.
39.english: of Shephupham, the family of the Shuphamites; of Hupham, the family of the Huphamites.

40.hebrew: וַיִּהְיוּ בְנֵי-בֶלַע, אַרְדְּ וְנַעֲמָן--מִשְׁפַּחַת, הָאַרְדִּי, לְנַעֲמָן, מִשְׁפַּחַת הַנַּעֲמִי.
40.english: And the sons of Bela were Ard and Naaman; [of Ard,] the family of the Ardites; of Naaman, the family of the Naamites.

41.hebrew: אֵלֶּה בְנֵי-בִנְיָמִן, לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָם; וּפְקֻדֵיהֶם, חֲמִשָּׁה וְאַרְבָּעִים אֶלֶף וְשֵׁשׁ מֵאוֹת.  {ס}
41.english: These are the sons of Benjamin after their families; and they that were numbered of them were forty and five thousand and six hundred. {S}

42.hebrew: אֵלֶּה בְנֵי-דָן, לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָם--לְשׁוּחָם, מִשְׁפַּחַת הַשּׁוּחָמִי; אֵלֶּה מִשְׁפְּחֹת דָּן, לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָם.
42.english: These are the sons of Dan after their families: of Shuham, the family of the Shuhamites. These are the families of Dan after their families.

43.hebrew: כָּל-מִשְׁפְּחֹת הַשּׁוּחָמִי, לִפְקֻדֵיהֶם--אַרְבָּעָה וְשִׁשִּׁים אֶלֶף, וְאַרְבַּע מֵאוֹת.  {ס}
43.english: All the families of the Shuhamites, according to those that were numbered of them, were threescore and four thousand and four hundred. {S}

44.hebrew: בְּנֵי אָשֵׁר, לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָם--לְיִמְנָה מִשְׁפַּחַת הַיִּמְנָה, לְיִשְׁוִי מִשְׁפַּחַת הַיִּשְׁוִי; לִבְרִיעָה, מִשְׁפַּחַת הַבְּרִיעִי.
44.english: The sons of Asher after their families: of Imnah, the family of the Imnites; of Ishvi, the family of the Ishvites; of Beriah, the family of the Beriites.

45.hebrew: לִבְנֵי בְרִיעָה--לְחֶבֶר, מִשְׁפַּחַת הַחֶבְרִי; לְמַלְכִּיאֵל--מִשְׁפַּחַת, הַמַּלְכִּיאֵלִי.
45.english: Of the sons of Beriah: of Heber, the family of the Heberites; of Malchiel, the family of the Malchielites.

46.english: And the name of the daughter of Asher was Serah.

47.hebrew: אֵלֶּה מִשְׁפְּחֹת בְּנֵי-אָשֵׁר, לִפְקֻדֵיהֶם--שְׁלֹשָׁה וַחֲמִשִּׁים אֶלֶף, וְאַרְבַּע מֵאוֹת.  {ס}
47.english: These are the families of the sons of Asher according to those that were numbered of them, fifty and three thousand and four hundred. {S}

48.hebrew: בְּנֵי נַפְתָּלִי, לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָם--לְיַחְצְאֵל, מִשְׁפַּחַת הַיַּחְצְאֵלִי; לְגוּנִי, מִשְׁפַּחַת הַגּוּנִי.
48.english: The sons of Naphtali after their families: of Jahzeel, the family of the Jahzeelites; of Guni, the family of the Gunites;

49.hebrew: לְיֵצֶר, מִשְׁפַּחַת הַיִּצְרִי; לְשִׁלֵּם, מִשְׁפַּחַת הַשִּׁלֵּמִי.
49.english: of Jezer, the family of the Jezerites; of Shillem, the family of the Shillemites.

50.hebrew: אֵלֶּה מִשְׁפְּחֹת נַפְתָּלִי, לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָם; וּפְקֻדֵיהֶם, חֲמִשָּׁה וְאַרְבָּעִים אֶלֶף וְאַרְבַּע מֵאוֹת.
50.english: These are the families of Naphtali according to their families; and they that were numbered of them were forty and five thousand and four hundred.

51.hebrew: אֵלֶּה, פְּקוּדֵי בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל--שֵׁשׁ-מֵאוֹת אֶלֶף, וָאָלֶף; שְׁבַע מֵאוֹת, וּשְׁלֹשִׁים.  {פ}
51.english: These are they that were numbered of the children of Israel, six hundred thousand and a thousand and seven hundred and thirty. {P}

52.english: And the LORD spoke unto Moses, saying:

53.english: 'Unto these the land shall be divided for an inheritance according to the number of names.

54.hebrew: לָרַב, תַּרְבֶּה נַחֲלָתוֹ, וְלַמְעַט, תַּמְעִיט נַחֲלָתוֹ:  אִישׁ לְפִי פְקֻדָיו, יֻתַּן נַחֲלָתוֹ.
54.english: To the more thou shalt give the more inheritance, and to the fewer thou shalt give the less inheritance; to each one according to those that were numbered of it shall its inheritance be given.

55.hebrew: אַךְ-בְּגוֹרָל, יֵחָלֵק אֶת-הָאָרֶץ:  לִשְׁמוֹת מַטּוֹת-אֲבֹתָם, יִנְחָלוּ.
55.english: Notwithstanding the land shall be divided by lot; according to the names of the tribes of their fathers they shall inherit.

56.hebrew: עַל-פִּי, הַגּוֹרָל, תֵּחָלֵק, נַחֲלָתוֹ--בֵּין רַב, לִמְעָט.  {ס}
56.english: According to the lot shall their inheritance be divided between the more and the fewer.' {S}

57.hebrew: וְאֵלֶּה פְקוּדֵי הַלֵּוִי, לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָם--לְגֵרְשׁוֹן מִשְׁפַּחַת הַגֵּרְשֻׁנִּי, לִקְהָת מִשְׁפַּחַת הַקְּהָתִי; לִמְרָרִי, מִשְׁפַּחַת הַמְּרָרִי.
57.english: And these are they that were numbered of the Levites after their families: of Gershon, the family of the Gershonites; of Kohath, the family of the Kohathites; of Merari, the family of the Merarites.

58.hebrew: אֵלֶּה מִשְׁפְּחֹת לֵוִי, מִשְׁפַּחַת הַלִּבְנִי מִשְׁפַּחַת הַחֶבְרֹנִי מִשְׁפַּחַת הַמַּחְלִי מִשְׁפַּחַת הַמּוּשִׁי, מִשְׁפַּחַת, הַקָּרְחִי; וּקְהָת, הוֹלִד אֶת-עַמְרָם.
58.english: These are the families of Levi: the family of the Libnites, the family of the Hebronites, the family of the Mahlites, the family of the Mushites, the family of the Korahites. And Kohath begot Amram.

59.hebrew: וְשֵׁם אֵשֶׁת עַמְרָם, יוֹכֶבֶד בַּת-לֵוִי, אֲשֶׁר יָלְדָה אֹתָהּ לְלֵוִי, בְּמִצְרָיִם; וַתֵּלֶד לְעַמְרָם, אֶת-אַהֲרֹן וְאֶת-מֹשֶׁה, וְאֵת, מִרְיָם אֲחֹתָם.
59.english: And the name of Amram's wife was Jochebed, the daughter of Levi, who was born to Levi in Egypt; and she bore unto Amram Aaron and Moses, and Miriam their sister.

60.hebrew: וַיִּוָּלֵד לְאַהֲרֹן, אֶת-נָדָב וְאֶת-אֲבִיהוּא, אֶת-אֶלְעָזָר, וְאֶת-אִיתָמָר.
60.english: And unto Aaron were born Nadab and Abihu, Eleazar and Ithamar.

61.hebrew: וַיָּמָת נָדָב, וַאֲבִיהוּא, בְּהַקְרִיבָם אֵשׁ-זָרָה, לִפְנֵי יְהוָה.
61.english: And Nadab and Abihu died, when they offered strange fire before the LORD.

62.hebrew: וַיִּהְיוּ פְקֻדֵיהֶם, שְׁלֹשָׁה וְעֶשְׂרִים אֶלֶף--כָּל-זָכָר, מִבֶּן-חֹדֶשׁ וָמָעְלָה:  כִּי לֹא הָתְפָּקְדוּ, בְּתוֹךְ בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל, כִּי לֹא-נִתַּן לָהֶם נַחֲלָה, בְּתוֹךְ בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל.
62.english: And they that were numbered of them were twenty and three thousand, every male from a month old and upward; for they were not numbered among the children of Israel, because there was no inheritance given them among the children of Israel.

63.hebrew: אֵלֶּה פְּקוּדֵי מֹשֶׁה, וְאֶלְעָזָר הַכֹּהֵן--אֲשֶׁר פָּקְדוּ אֶת-בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל, בְּעַרְבֹת מוֹאָב, עַל, יַרְדֵּן יְרֵחוֹ.
63.english: These are they that were numbered by Moses and Eleazar the priest, who numbered the children of Israel in the plains of Moab by the Jordan at Jericho.

64.hebrew: וּבְאֵלֶּה, לֹא-הָיָה אִישׁ, מִפְּקוּדֵי מֹשֶׁה, וְאַהֲרֹן הַכֹּהֵן--אֲשֶׁר פָּקְדוּ אֶת-בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל, בְּמִדְבַּר סִינָי.
64.english: But among these there was not a man of them that were numbered by Moses and Aaron the priest, who numbered the children of Israel in the wilderness of Sinai.

65.hebrew: כִּי-אָמַר יְהוָה לָהֶם, מוֹת יָמֻתוּ בַּמִּדְבָּר; וְלֹא-נוֹתַר מֵהֶם, אִישׁ--כִּי אִם-כָּלֵב בֶּן-יְפֻנֶּה, וִיהוֹשֻׁעַ בִּן-נוּן.  {ס}
65.english: For the LORD had said of them: 'They shall surely die in the wilderness.' And there was not left a man of them, save Caleb the son of Jephunneh, and Joshua the son of Nun. {S}

1.hebrew: וַתִּקְרַבְנָה בְּנוֹת צְלָפְחָד, בֶּן-חֵפֶר בֶּן-גִּלְעָד בֶּן-מָכִיר בֶּן-מְנַשֶּׁה, לְמִשְׁפְּחֹת, מְנַשֶּׁה בֶן-יוֹסֵף; וְאֵלֶּה, שְׁמוֹת בְּנֹתָיו--מַחְלָה נֹעָה, וְחָגְלָה וּמִלְכָּה וְתִרְצָה.
1.english: Then drew near the daughters of Zelophehad, the son of Hepher, the son of Gilead, the son of Machir, the son of Manasseh, of the families of Manasseh the son of Joseph; and these are the names of his daughters: Mahlah, Noah, and Hoglah, and Milcah, and Tirzah.

2.hebrew: וַתַּעֲמֹדְנָה לִפְנֵי מֹשֶׁה, וְלִפְנֵי אֶלְעָזָר הַכֹּהֵן, וְלִפְנֵי הַנְּשִׂיאִם, וְכָל-הָעֵדָה--פֶּתַח אֹהֶל-מוֹעֵד, לֵאמֹר.
2.english: And they stood before Moses, and before Eleazar the priest, and before the princes and all the congregation, at the door of the tent of meeting, saying:

3.hebrew: אָבִינוּ, מֵת בַּמִּדְבָּר, וְהוּא לֹא-הָיָה בְּתוֹךְ הָעֵדָה הַנּוֹעָדִים עַל-יְהוָה, בַּעֲדַת-קֹרַח:  כִּי-בְחֶטְאוֹ מֵת, וּבָנִים לֹא-הָיוּ לוֹ.
3.english: 'Our father died in the wilderness, and he was not among the company of them that gathered themselves together against the LORD in the company of Korah, but he died in his own sin; and he had no sons.

4.hebrew: לָמָּה יִגָּרַע שֵׁם-אָבִינוּ מִתּוֹךְ מִשְׁפַּחְתּוֹ, כִּי אֵין לוֹ בֵּן; תְּנָה-לָּנוּ אֲחֻזָּה, בְּתוֹךְ אֲחֵי אָבִינוּ.
4.english: Why should the name of our father be done away from among his family, because he had no son? Give unto us a possession among the brethren of our father.'

5.hebrew: וַיַּקְרֵב מֹשֶׁה אֶת-מִשְׁפָּטָן, לִפְנֵי יְהוָה.  {פ}
5.english: And Moses brought their cause before the LORD. {P}

6.hebrew: וַיֹּאמֶר יְהוָה, אֶל-מֹשֶׁה לֵּאמֹר.
6.english: And the LORD spoke unto Moses, saying:

7.hebrew: כֵּן, בְּנוֹת צְלָפְחָד דֹּבְרֹת--נָתֹן תִּתֵּן לָהֶם אֲחֻזַּת נַחֲלָה, בְּתוֹךְ אֲחֵי אֲבִיהֶם; וְהַעֲבַרְתָּ אֶת-נַחֲלַת אֲבִיהֶן, לָהֶן.
7.english: 'The daughters of Zelophehad speak right: thou shalt surely give them a possession of an inheritance among their father's brethren; and thou shalt cause the inheritance of their father to pass unto them.

8.hebrew: וְאֶל-בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל, תְּדַבֵּר לֵאמֹר:  אִישׁ כִּי-יָמוּת, וּבֵן אֵין לוֹ--וְהַעֲבַרְתֶּם אֶת-נַחֲלָתוֹ, לְבִתּוֹ.
8.english: And thou shalt speak unto the children of Israel, saying: If a man die, and have no son, then ye shall cause his inheritance to pass unto his daughter.

9.hebrew: וְאִם-אֵין לוֹ, בַּת--וּנְתַתֶּם אֶת-נַחֲלָתוֹ, לְאֶחָיו.
9.english: And if he have no daughter, then ye shall give his inheritance unto his brethren.

10.hebrew: וְאִם-אֵין לוֹ, אַחִים--וּנְתַתֶּם אֶת-נַחֲלָתוֹ, לַאֲחֵי אָבִיו.
10.english: And if he have no brethren, then ye shall give his inheritance unto his father's brethren.

11.hebrew: וְאִם-אֵין אַחִים, לְאָבִיו--וּנְתַתֶּם אֶת-נַחֲלָתוֹ לִשְׁאֵרוֹ הַקָּרֹב אֵלָיו מִמִּשְׁפַּחְתּוֹ, וְיָרַשׁ אֹתָהּ; וְהָיְתָה לִבְנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל, לְחֻקַּת מִשְׁפָּט, כַּאֲשֶׁר צִוָּה יְהוָה, אֶת-מֹשֶׁה.  {פ}
11.english: And if his father have no brethren, then ye shall give his inheritance unto his kinsman that is next to him of his family, and he shall possess it. And it shall be unto the children of Israel a statute of judgment, as the LORD commanded Moses.' {P}

12.hebrew: וַיֹּאמֶר יְהוָה אֶל-מֹשֶׁה, עֲלֵה אֶל-הַר הָעֲבָרִים הַזֶּה; וּרְאֵה, אֶת-הָאָרֶץ, אֲשֶׁר נָתַתִּי, לִבְנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל.
12.english: And the LORD said unto Moses: 'Get thee up into this mountain of Abarim, and behold the land which I have given unto the children of Israel.

13.hebrew: וְרָאִיתָה אֹתָהּ, וְנֶאֱסַפְתָּ אֶל-עַמֶּיךָ גַּם-אָתָּה, כַּאֲשֶׁר נֶאֱסַף, אַהֲרֹן אָחִיךָ.
13.english: And when thou hast seen it, thou also shalt be gathered unto thy people, as Aaron thy brother was gathered;

14.hebrew: כַּאֲשֶׁר מְרִיתֶם פִּי בְּמִדְבַּר-צִן, בִּמְרִיבַת הָעֵדָה, לְהַקְדִּישֵׁנִי בַמַּיִם, לְעֵינֵיהֶם:  הֵם מֵי-מְרִיבַת קָדֵשׁ, מִדְבַּר-צִן.  {ס}
14.english: because ye rebelled against My commandment in the wilderness of Zin, in the strife of the congregation, to sanctify Me at the waters before their eyes.'--These are the waters of Meribath-kadesh in the wilderness of Zin.-- {S}

15.hebrew: וַיְדַבֵּר מֹשֶׁה, אֶל-יְהוָה לֵאמֹר.
15.english: And Moses spoke unto the LORD, saying:

16.hebrew: יִפְקֹד יְהוָה, אֱלֹהֵי הָרוּחֹת לְכָל-בָּשָׂר, אִישׁ, עַל-הָעֵדָה.
16.english: 'Let the LORD, the God of the spirits of all flesh, set a man over the congregation,

17.hebrew: אֲשֶׁר-יֵצֵא לִפְנֵיהֶם, וַאֲשֶׁר יָבֹא לִפְנֵיהֶם, וַאֲשֶׁר יוֹצִיאֵם, וַאֲשֶׁר יְבִיאֵם; וְלֹא תִהְיֶה, עֲדַת יְהוָה, כַּצֹּאן, אֲשֶׁר אֵין-לָהֶם רֹעֶה.
17.english: who may go out before them, and who may come in before them, and who may lead them out, and who may bring them in; that the congregation of the LORD be not as sheep which have no shepherd.'

18.hebrew: וַיֹּאמֶר יְהוָה אֶל-מֹשֶׁה, קַח-לְךָ אֶת-יְהוֹשֻׁעַ בִּן-נוּן--אִישׁ, אֲשֶׁר-רוּחַ בּוֹ; וְסָמַכְתָּ אֶת-יָדְךָ, עָלָיו.
18.english: And the LORD said unto Moses: 'Take thee Joshua the son of Nun, a man in whom is spirit, and lay thy hand upon him;

19.hebrew: וְהַעֲמַדְתָּ אֹתוֹ, לִפְנֵי אֶלְעָזָר הַכֹּהֵן, וְלִפְנֵי, כָּל-הָעֵדָה; וְצִוִּיתָה אֹתוֹ, לְעֵינֵיהֶם.
19.english: and set him before Eleazar the priest, and before all the congregation; and give him a charge in their sight.

20.hebrew: וְנָתַתָּה מֵהוֹדְךָ, עָלָיו--לְמַעַן יִשְׁמְעוּ, כָּל-עֲדַת בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל.
20.english: And thou shalt put of thy honour upon him, that all the congregation of the children of Israel may hearken.

21.hebrew: וְלִפְנֵי אֶלְעָזָר הַכֹּהֵן יַעֲמֹד, וְשָׁאַל לוֹ בְּמִשְׁפַּט הָאוּרִים לִפְנֵי יְהוָה:  עַל-פִּיו יֵצְאוּ וְעַל-פִּיו יָבֹאוּ, הוּא וְכָל-בְּנֵי-יִשְׂרָאֵל אִתּוֹ--וְכָל-הָעֵדָה.
21.english: And he shall stand before Eleazar the priest, who shall inquire for him by the judgment of the Urim before the LORD; at his word shall they go out, and at his word they shall come in, both he, and all the children of Israel with him, even all the congregation.'

22.hebrew: וַיַּעַשׂ מֹשֶׁה, כַּאֲשֶׁר צִוָּה יְהוָה אֹתוֹ; וַיִּקַּח אֶת-יְהוֹשֻׁעַ, וַיַּעֲמִדֵהוּ לִפְנֵי אֶלְעָזָר הַכֹּהֵן, וְלִפְנֵי, כָּל-הָעֵדָה.
22.english: And Moses did as the LORD commanded him; and he took Joshua, and set him before Eleazar the priest, and before all the congregation.

23.hebrew: וַיִּסְמֹךְ אֶת-יָדָיו עָלָיו, וַיְצַוֵּהוּ, כַּאֲשֶׁר דִּבֶּר יְהוָה, בְּיַד-מֹשֶׁה.  {פ}
23.english: And he laid his hands upon him, and gave him a charge, as the LORD spoke by the hand of Moses. {P}

1.hebrew: וַיְדַבֵּר יְהוָה, אֶל-מֹשֶׁה לֵּאמֹר.
1.english: And the LORD spoke unto Moses, saying:

2.hebrew: צַו אֶת-בְּנֵי יִשְׂרָאֵל, וְאָמַרְתָּ אֲלֵהֶם:  אֶת-קָרְבָּנִי לַחְמִי לְאִשַּׁי, רֵיחַ נִיחֹחִי, תִּשְׁמְרוּ, לְהַקְרִיב לִי בְּמוֹעֲדוֹ.
2.english: Command the children of Israel, and say unto them: My food which is presented unto Me for offerings made by fire, of a sweet savour unto Me, shall ye observe to offer unto Me in its due season.

3.hebrew: וְאָמַרְתָּ לָהֶם--זֶה הָאִשֶּׁה, אֲשֶׁר תַּקְרִיבוּ לַיהוָה:  כְּבָשִׂים בְּנֵי-שָׁנָה תְמִימִם שְׁנַיִם לַיּוֹם, עֹלָה תָמִיד.
3.english: And thou shalt say unto them: This is the offering made by fire which ye shall bring unto the LORD: he-lambs of the first year without blemish, two day by day, for a continual burnt-offering.

4.hebrew: אֶת-הַכֶּבֶשׂ אֶחָד, תַּעֲשֶׂה בַבֹּקֶר; וְאֵת הַכֶּבֶשׂ הַשֵּׁנִי, תַּעֲשֶׂה בֵּין הָעַרְבָּיִם.
4.english: The one lamb shalt thou offer in the morning, and the other lamb shalt thou offer at dusk;

5.hebrew: וַעֲשִׂירִית הָאֵיפָה סֹלֶת, לְמִנְחָה, בְּלוּלָה בְּשֶׁמֶן כָּתִית, רְבִיעִת הַהִין.
5.english: and the tenth part of an ephah of fine flour for a meal-offering, mingled with the fourth part of a hin of beaten oil.

6.hebrew: עֹלַת, תָּמִיד--הָעֲשֻׂיָה, בְּהַר סִינַי, לְרֵיחַ נִיחֹחַ, אִשֶּׁה לַיהוָה.
6.english: It is a continual burnt-offering, which was offered in mount Sinai, for a sweet savour, an offering made by fire unto the LORD.

7.hebrew: וְנִסְכּוֹ רְבִיעִת הַהִין, לַכֶּבֶשׂ הָאֶחָד; בַּקֹּדֶשׁ, הַסֵּךְ נֶסֶךְ שֵׁכָר--לַיהוָה.
7.english: And the drink-offering thereof shall be the fourth part of a hin for the one lamb; in the holy place shalt thou pour out a drink-offering of strong drink unto the LORD.

8.hebrew: וְאֵת הַכֶּבֶשׂ הַשֵּׁנִי, תַּעֲשֶׂה בֵּין הָעַרְבָּיִם:  כְּמִנְחַת הַבֹּקֶר וּכְנִסְכּוֹ תַּעֲשֶׂה, אִשֵּׁה רֵיחַ נִיחֹחַ לַיהוָה.  {פ}
8.english: And the other lamb shalt thou present at dusk; as the meal-offering of the morning, and as the drink-offering thereof, thou shalt present it, an offering made by fire, of a sweet savour unto the LORD. {P}

9.hebrew: וּבְיוֹם, הַשַּׁבָּת--שְׁנֵי-כְבָשִׂים בְּנֵי-שָׁנָה, תְּמִימִם; וּשְׁנֵי עֶשְׂרֹנִים, סֹלֶת מִנְחָה בְּלוּלָה בַשֶּׁמֶן--וְנִסְכּוֹ.
9.english: And on the sabbath day two he-lambs of the first year without blemish, and two tenth parts of an ephah of fine flour for a meal-offering, mingled with oil, and the drink-offering thereof.

10.hebrew: עֹלַת שַׁבַּת, בְּשַׁבַּתּוֹ, עַל-עֹלַת הַתָּמִיד, וְנִסְכָּהּ.  {פ}
10.english: This is the burnt-offering of every sabbath, beside the continual burnt-offering, and the drink-offering thereof. {P}

11.hebrew: וּבְרָאשֵׁי, חָדְשֵׁיכֶם--תַּקְרִיבוּ עֹלָה, לַיהוָה:  פָּרִים בְּנֵי-בָקָר שְׁנַיִם וְאַיִל אֶחָד, כְּבָשִׂים בְּנֵי-שָׁנָה שִׁבְעָה תְּמִימִם.
11.english: And in your new moons ye shall present a burnt-offering unto the LORD: two young bullocks, and one ram, seven he-lambs of the first year without blemish;

12.hebrew: וּשְׁלֹשָׁה עֶשְׂרֹנִים, סֹלֶת מִנְחָה בְּלוּלָה בַשֶּׁמֶן, לַפָּר, הָאֶחָד; וּשְׁנֵי עֶשְׂרֹנִים, סֹלֶת מִנְחָה בְּלוּלָה בַשֶּׁמֶן, לָאַיִל, הָאֶחָד.
12.english: and three tenth parts of an ephah of fine flour for a meal-offering, mingled with oil, for each bullock; and two tenth parts of fine flour for a meal-offering, mingled with oil, for the one ram;

13.hebrew: וְעִשָּׂרֹן עִשָּׂרוֹן, סֹלֶת מִנְחָה בְּלוּלָה בַשֶּׁמֶן, לַכֶּבֶשׂ, הָאֶחָד; עֹלָה רֵיחַ נִיחֹחַ, אִשֶּׁה לַיהוָה.
13.english: and a several tenth part of fine flour mingled with oil for a meal-offering unto every lamb; for a burnt-offering of a sweet savour, an offering made by fire unto the LORD.

14.hebrew: וְנִסְכֵּיהֶם, חֲצִי הַהִין יִהְיֶה לַפָּר וּשְׁלִישִׁת הַהִין לָאַיִל וּרְבִיעִת הַהִין לַכֶּבֶשׂ--יָיִן:  זֹאת עֹלַת חֹדֶשׁ בְּחָדְשׁוֹ, לְחָדְשֵׁי הַשָּׁנָה.
14.english: And their drink-offerings shall be half a hin of wine for a bullock, and the third part of a hin for the ram, and the fourth part of a hin for a lamb. This is the burnt-offering of every new moon throughout the months of the year.

15.hebrew: וּשְׂעִיר עִזִּים אֶחָד לְחַטָּאת, לַיהוָה, עַל-עֹלַת הַתָּמִיד יֵעָשֶׂה, וְנִסְכּוֹ.  {ס}
15.english: And one he-goat for a sin-offering unto the LORD; it shall be offered beside the continual burnt-offering, and the drink-offering thereof. {S}

16.hebrew: וּבַחֹדֶשׁ הָרִאשׁוֹן, בְּאַרְבָּעָה עָשָׂר יוֹם--לַחֹדֶשׁ:  פֶּסַח, לַיהוָה.
16.english: And in the first month, on the fourteenth day of the month, is the LORD'S passover.

17.hebrew: וּבַחֲמִשָּׁה עָשָׂר יוֹם לַחֹדֶשׁ הַזֶּה, חָג:  שִׁבְעַת יָמִים, מַצּוֹת יֵאָכֵל.
17.english: And on the fifteenth day of this month shall be a feast; seven days shall unleavened bread be eaten.

18.hebrew: בַּיּוֹם הָרִאשׁוֹן, מִקְרָא-קֹדֶשׁ:  כָּל-מְלֶאכֶת עֲבֹדָה, לֹא תַעֲשׂוּ.
18.english: In the first day shall be a holy convocation; ye shall do no manner of servile work;

19.hebrew: וְהִקְרַבְתֶּם אִשֶּׁה עֹלָה לַיהוָה, פָּרִים בְּנֵי-בָקָר שְׁנַיִם וְאַיִל אֶחָד; וְשִׁבְעָה כְבָשִׂים בְּנֵי שָׁנָה, תְּמִימִם יִהְיוּ לָכֶם.
19.english: but ye shall present an offering made by fire, a burnt-offering unto the LORD: two young bullocks, and one ram, and seven he-lambs of the first year; they shall be unto you without blemish;

20.hebrew: וּמִנְחָתָם--סֹלֶת, בְּלוּלָה בַשָּׁמֶן:  שְׁלֹשָׁה עֶשְׂרֹנִים לַפָּר, וּשְׁנֵי עֶשְׂרֹנִים לָאַיִל--תַּעֲשׂוּ.
20.english: and their meal-offering, fine flour mingled with oil; three tenth parts shall ye offer for a bullock, and two tenth parts for the ram;

21.hebrew: עִשָּׂרוֹן עִשָּׂרוֹן, תַּעֲשֶׂה, לַכֶּבֶשׂ, הָאֶחָד--לְשִׁבְעַת, הַכְּבָשִׂים.
21.english: a several tenth part shalt thou offer for every lamb of the seven lambs;

22.hebrew: וּשְׂעִיר חַטָּאת, אֶחָד, לְכַפֵּר, עֲלֵיכֶם.
22.english: and one he-goat for a sin-offering, to make atonement for you.

23.hebrew: מִלְּבַד עֹלַת הַבֹּקֶר, אֲשֶׁר לְעֹלַת הַתָּמִיד--תַּעֲשׂוּ, אֶת-אֵלֶּה.
23.english: Ye shall offer these beside the burnt-offering of the morning, which is for a continual burnt-offering.

24.hebrew: כָּאֵלֶּה תַּעֲשׂוּ לַיּוֹם, שִׁבְעַת יָמִים--לֶחֶם אִשֵּׁה רֵיחַ-נִיחֹחַ, לַיהוָה; עַל-עוֹלַת הַתָּמִיד יֵעָשֶׂה, וְנִסְכּוֹ.
24.english: After this manner ye shall offer daily, for seven days, the food of the offering made by fire, of a sweet savour unto the LORD; it shall be offered beside the continual burnt-offering, and the drink-offering thereof.

25.hebrew: וּבַיּוֹם, הַשְּׁבִיעִי--מִקְרָא-קֹדֶשׁ, יִהְיֶה לָכֶם:  כָּל-מְלֶאכֶת עֲבֹדָה, לֹא תַעֲשׂוּ.  {ס}
25.english: And on the seventh day ye shall have a holy convocation; ye shall do no manner of servile work. {S}

26.hebrew: וּבְיוֹם הַבִּכּוּרִים, בְּהַקְרִיבְכֶם מִנְחָה חֲדָשָׁה לַיהוָה--בְּשָׁבֻעֹתֵיכֶם:  מִקְרָא-קֹדֶשׁ יִהְיֶה לָכֶם, כָּל-מְלֶאכֶת עֲבֹדָה לֹא תַעֲשׂוּ.
26.english: Also in the day of the first-fruits, when ye bring a new meal-offering unto the LORD in your feast of weeks, ye shall have a holy convocation: ye shall do no manner of servile work;

27.hebrew: וְהִקְרַבְתֶּם עוֹלָה לְרֵיחַ נִיחֹחַ, לַיהוָה--פָּרִים בְּנֵי-בָקָר שְׁנַיִם, אַיִל אֶחָד; שִׁבְעָה כְבָשִׂים, בְּנֵי שָׁנָה.
27.english: but ye shall present a burnt-offering for a sweet savour unto the LORD: two young bullocks, one ram, seven he-lambs of the first year;

28.hebrew: וּמִנְחָתָם--סֹלֶת, בְּלוּלָה בַשָּׁמֶן:  שְׁלֹשָׁה עֶשְׂרֹנִים, לַפָּר הָאֶחָד, שְׁנֵי עֶשְׂרֹנִים, לָאַיִל הָאֶחָד.
28.english: and their meal-offering, fine flour mingled with oil, three tenth parts for each bullock, two tenth parts for the one ram,

29.hebrew: עִשָּׂרוֹן, עִשָּׂרוֹן, לַכֶּבֶשׂ, הָאֶחָד--לְשִׁבְעַת, הַכְּבָשִׂים.
29.english: a several tenth part for every lamb of the seven lambs;

30.hebrew: שְׂעִיר עִזִּים, אֶחָד, לְכַפֵּר, עֲלֵיכֶם.
30.english: one he-goat, to make atonement for you.

31.hebrew: מִלְּבַד עֹלַת הַתָּמִיד, וּמִנְחָתוֹ--תַּעֲשׂוּ; תְּמִימִם יִהְיוּ-לָכֶם, וְנִסְכֵּיהֶם.  {פ}
31.english: Beside the continual burnt-offering, and the meal-offering thereof, ye shall offer them--they shall be unto you without blemish--and their drink-offerings. {P}

1.hebrew: וּבַחֹדֶשׁ הַשְּׁבִיעִי בְּאֶחָד לַחֹדֶשׁ, מִקְרָא-קֹדֶשׁ יִהְיֶה לָכֶם--כָּל-מְלֶאכֶת עֲבֹדָה, לֹא תַעֲשׂוּ:  יוֹם תְּרוּעָה, יִהְיֶה לָכֶם.
1.english: And in the seventh month, on the first day of the month, ye shall have a holy convocation: ye shall do no manner of servile work; it is a day of blowing the horn unto you.

2.hebrew: וַעֲשִׂיתֶם עֹלָה לְרֵיחַ נִיחֹחַ, לַיהוָה--פַּר בֶּן-בָּקָר אֶחָד, אַיִל אֶחָד; כְּבָשִׂים בְּנֵי-שָׁנָה שִׁבְעָה, תְּמִימִם.
2.english: And ye shall prepare a burnt-offering for a sweet savour unto the LORD: one young bullock, one ram, seven he-lambs of the first year without blemish;

3.hebrew: וּמִנְחָתָם--סֹלֶת, בְּלוּלָה בַשָּׁמֶן:  שְׁלֹשָׁה עֶשְׂרֹנִים לַפָּר, שְׁנֵי עֶשְׂרֹנִים לָאָיִל.
3.english: and their meal-offering, fine flour mingled with oil, three tenth parts for the bullock, two tenth part for the ram,

4.hebrew: וְעִשָּׂרוֹן אֶחָד, לַכֶּבֶשׂ הָאֶחָד, לְשִׁבְעַת, הַכְּבָשִׂים.
4.english: and one tenth part for every lamb of the seven lambs;

5.hebrew: וּשְׂעִיר-עִזִּים אֶחָד, חַטָּאת, לְכַפֵּר, עֲלֵיכֶם.
5.english: and one he-goat for a sin-offering, to make atonement for you;

6.hebrew: מִלְּבַד עֹלַת הַחֹדֶשׁ וּמִנְחָתָהּ, וְעֹלַת הַתָּמִיד וּמִנְחָתָהּ, וְנִסְכֵּיהֶם, כְּמִשְׁפָּטָם:  לְרֵיחַ נִיחֹחַ, אִשֶּׁה לַיהוָה.  {ס}
6.english: beside the burnt-offering of the new moon, and the meal-offering thereof, and the continual burnt-offering and the meal-offering thereof, and their drink-offerings, according unto their ordinance, for a sweet savour, an offering made by fire unto the LORD. {S}

7.hebrew: וּבֶעָשׂוֹר לַחֹדֶשׁ הַשְּׁבִיעִי הַזֶּה, מִקְרָא-קֹדֶשׁ יִהְיֶה לָכֶם, וְעִנִּיתֶם, אֶת-נַפְשֹׁתֵיכֶם; כָּל-מְלָאכָה, לֹא תַעֲשׂוּ.
7.english: And on the tenth day of this seventh month ye shall have a holy convocation; and ye shall afflict your souls; ye shall do no manner of work;

8.hebrew: וְהִקְרַבְתֶּם עֹלָה לַיהוָה רֵיחַ נִיחֹחַ, פַּר בֶּן-בָּקָר אֶחָד אַיִל אֶחָד; כְּבָשִׂים בְּנֵי-שָׁנָה שִׁבְעָה, תְּמִימִם יִהְיוּ לָכֶם.
8.english: but ye shall present a burnt-offering unto the LORD for a sweet savour: one young bullock, one ram, seven he-lambs of the first year; they shall be unto you without blemish;

9.hebrew: וּמִנְחָתָם--סֹלֶת, בְּלוּלָה בַשָּׁמֶן:  שְׁלֹשָׁה עֶשְׂרֹנִים, לַפָּר, שְׁנֵי עֶשְׂרֹנִים, לָאַיִל הָאֶחָד.
9.english: and their meal-offering, fine flour mingled with oil, three tenth parts for the bullock, two tenth parts for the one ram,

10.hebrew: עִשָּׂרוֹן, עִשָּׂרוֹן, לַכֶּבֶשׂ, הָאֶחָד--לְשִׁבְעַת, הַכְּבָשִׂים.
10.english: a several tenth part for every lamb of the seven lambs;

11.hebrew: שְׂעִיר-עִזִּים אֶחָד, חַטָּאת; מִלְּבַד חַטַּאת הַכִּפֻּרִים, וְעֹלַת הַתָּמִיד, וּמִנְחָתָהּ, וְנִסְכֵּיהֶם.  {ס}
11.english: one he-goat for a sin-offering; beside the sin-offering of atonement, and the continual burnt-offering, and the meal-offering thereof, and their drink-offerings. {S}

12.hebrew: וּבַחֲמִשָּׁה עָשָׂר יוֹם לַחֹדֶשׁ הַשְּׁבִיעִי, מִקְרָא-קֹדֶשׁ יִהְיֶה לָכֶם--כָּל-מְלֶאכֶת עֲבֹדָה, לֹא תַעֲשׂוּ; וְחַגֹּתֶם חַג לַיהוָה, שִׁבְעַת יָמִים.
12.english: And on the fifteenth day of the seventh month ye shall have a holy convocation: ye shall do no manner of servile work, and ye shall keep a feast unto the LORD seven days;

13.hebrew: וְהִקְרַבְתֶּם עֹלָה אִשֵּׁה רֵיחַ נִיחֹחַ, לַיהוָה--פָּרִים בְּנֵי-בָקָר שְׁלֹשָׁה עָשָׂר, אֵילִם שְׁנָיִם; כְּבָשִׂים בְּנֵי-שָׁנָה אַרְבָּעָה עָשָׂר, תְּמִימִם יִהְיוּ.
13.english: and ye shall present a burnt-offering, an offering made by fire, of a sweet savour unto the LORD: thirteen young bullocks, two rams, fourteen he-lambs of the first year; they shall be without blemish;

14.hebrew: וּמִנְחָתָם--סֹלֶת, בְּלוּלָה בַשָּׁמֶן:  שְׁלֹשָׁה עֶשְׂרֹנִים לַפָּר הָאֶחָד, לִשְׁלֹשָׁה עָשָׂר פָּרִים, שְׁנֵי עֶשְׂרֹנִים לָאַיִל הָאֶחָד, לִשְׁנֵי הָאֵילִם.
14.english: and their meal-offering, fine flour mingled with oil, three tenth parts for every bullock of the thirteen bullocks, two tenth parts for each ram of the two rams,

15.hebrew: וְעִשָּׂרוֹן, עִשָּׂרוֹן, לַכֶּבֶשׂ, הָאֶחָד--לְאַרְבָּעָה עָשָׂר, כְּבָשִׂים.
15.english: and a several tenth part for every lamb of the fourteen lambs;

16.hebrew: וּשְׂעִיר-עִזִּים אֶחָד, חַטָּאת; מִלְּבַד עֹלַת הַתָּמִיד, מִנְחָתָהּ וְנִסְכָּהּ.  {ס}
16.english: and one he-goat for a sin-offering beside the continual burnt-offering, the meal-offering thereof, and the drink-offering thereof. {S}

17.hebrew: וּבַיּוֹם הַשֵּׁנִי, פָּרִים בְּנֵי-בָקָר שְׁנֵים עָשָׂר--אֵילִם שְׁנָיִם; כְּבָשִׂים בְּנֵי-שָׁנָה אַרְבָּעָה עָשָׂר, תְּמִימִם.
17.english: And on the second day ye shall present twelve young bullocks, two rams, fourteen he-lambs of the first year without blemish;

18.hebrew: וּמִנְחָתָם וְנִסְכֵּיהֶם לַפָּרִים לָאֵילִם וְלַכְּבָשִׂים, בְּמִסְפָּרָם--כַּמִּשְׁפָּט.
18.english: and their meal-offering and their drink-offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, according to their number, after the ordinance;

19.hebrew: וּשְׂעִיר-עִזִּים אֶחָד, חַטָּאת; מִלְּבַד עֹלַת הַתָּמִיד, וּמִנְחָתָהּ וְנִסְכֵּיהֶם.  {ס}
19.english: and one he-goat for a sin-offering; beside the continual burnt-offering, and the meal-offering thereof, and their drink-offerings. {S}

20.hebrew: וּבַיּוֹם הַשְּׁלִישִׁי פָּרִים עַשְׁתֵּי-עָשָׂר, אֵילִם שְׁנָיִם; כְּבָשִׂים בְּנֵי-שָׁנָה אַרְבָּעָה עָשָׂר, תְּמִימִם.
20.english: And on the third day eleven bullocks, two rams, fourteen he-lambs of the first year without blemish;

21.hebrew: וּמִנְחָתָם וְנִסְכֵּיהֶם לַפָּרִים לָאֵילִם וְלַכְּבָשִׂים, בְּמִסְפָּרָם--כַּמִּשְׁפָּט.
21.english: and their meal-offering and their drink-offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, according to their number, after the ordinance;

22.hebrew: וּשְׂעִיר חַטָּאת, אֶחָד; מִלְּבַד עֹלַת הַתָּמִיד, וּמִנְחָתָהּ וְנִסְכָּהּ.  {ס}
22.english: and one he-goat for a sin-offering; beside the continual burnt-offering, and the meal-offering thereof, and the drink-offering thereof. {S}

23.hebrew: וּבַיּוֹם הָרְבִיעִי פָּרִים עֲשָׂרָה, אֵילִם שְׁנָיִם; כְּבָשִׂים בְּנֵי-שָׁנָה אַרְבָּעָה עָשָׂר, תְּמִימִם.
23.english: And on the fourth day ten bullocks, two rams, fourteen he-lambs of the first year without blemish;

24.hebrew: מִנְחָתָם וְנִסְכֵּיהֶם לַפָּרִים לָאֵילִם וְלַכְּבָשִׂים, בְּמִסְפָּרָם--כַּמִּשְׁפָּט.
24.english: their meal-offering and their drink-offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, according to their number, after the ordinance;

25.hebrew: וּשְׂעִיר-עִזִּים אֶחָד, חַטָּאת; מִלְּבַד עֹלַת הַתָּמִיד, מִנְחָתָהּ וְנִסְכָּהּ.  {ס}
25.english: and one he-goat for a sin-offering; beside the continual burnt-offering, the meal-offering thereof, and the drink-offering thereof. {S}

26.hebrew: וּבַיּוֹם הַחֲמִישִׁי פָּרִים תִּשְׁעָה, אֵילִם שְׁנָיִם; כְּבָשִׂים בְּנֵי-שָׁנָה אַרְבָּעָה עָשָׂר, תְּמִימִם.
26.english: And on the fifth day nine bullocks, two rams, fourteen he-lambs of the first year without blemish;

27.hebrew: וּמִנְחָתָם וְנִסְכֵּיהֶם לַפָּרִים לָאֵילִם וְלַכְּבָשִׂים, בְּמִסְפָּרָם--כַּמִּשְׁפָּט.
27.english: and their meal-offering and their drink-offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, according to their number, after the ordinance;

28.hebrew: וּשְׂעִיר חַטָּאת, אֶחָד; מִלְּבַד עֹלַת הַתָּמִיד, וּמִנְחָתָהּ וְנִסְכָּהּ.  {ס}
28.english: and one he-goat for a sin-offering; beside the continual burnt-offering, and the meal-offering thereof, and the drink-offering thereof. {S}

29.hebrew: וּבַיּוֹם הַשִּׁשִּׁי פָּרִים שְׁמֹנָה, אֵילִם שְׁנָיִם; כְּבָשִׂים בְּנֵי-שָׁנָה אַרְבָּעָה עָשָׂר, תְּמִימִם.
29.english: And on the sixth day eight bullocks, two rams, fourteen he-lambs of the first year without blemish;

30.hebrew: וּמִנְחָתָם וְנִסְכֵּיהֶם לַפָּרִים לָאֵילִם וְלַכְּבָשִׂים, בְּמִסְפָּרָם--כַּמִּשְׁפָּט.
30.english: and their meal-offering and their drink-offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, according to their number, after the ordinance;

31.hebrew: וּשְׂעִיר חַטָּאת, אֶחָד; מִלְּבַד עֹלַת הַתָּמִיד, מִנְחָתָהּ וּנְסָכֶיהָ.  {ס}
31.english: and one he-goat for a sin-offering; beside the continual burnt-offering, the meal-offering thereof, and the drink-offerings thereof. {S}

32.hebrew: וּבַיּוֹם הַשְּׁבִיעִי פָּרִים שִׁבְעָה, אֵילִם שְׁנָיִם; כְּבָשִׂים בְּנֵי-שָׁנָה אַרְבָּעָה עָשָׂר, תְּמִימִם.
32.english: And on the seventh day seven bullocks, two rams, fourteen he-lambs of the first year without blemish;

33.hebrew: וּמִנְחָתָם וְנִסְכֵּהֶם לַפָּרִים לָאֵילִם וְלַכְּבָשִׂים, בְּמִסְפָּרָם--כְּמִשְׁפָּטָם.
33.english: and their meal-offering and their drink-offerings for the bullocks, for the rams, and for the lambs, according to their number, after the ordinance;

34.hebrew: וּשְׂעִיר חַטָּאת, אֶחָד; מִלְּבַד עֹלַת הַתָּמִיד, מִנְחָתָהּ וְנִסְכָּהּ.  {ס}
34.english: and one he-goat for a sin-offering; beside the continual burnt-offering, the meal-offering thereof, and the drink-offering thereof. {S}

35.hebrew: בַּיּוֹם, הַשְּׁמִינִי--עֲצֶרֶת, תִּהְיֶה לָכֶם:  כָּל-מְלֶאכֶת עֲבֹדָה, לֹא תַעֲשׂוּ.
35.english: On the eighth day ye shall have a solemn assembly: ye shall do no manner of servile work;

36.hebrew: וְהִקְרַבְתֶּם עֹלָה אִשֵּׁה רֵיחַ נִיחֹחַ, לַיהוָה--פַּר אֶחָד, אַיִל אֶחָד; כְּבָשִׂים בְּנֵי-שָׁנָה שִׁבְעָה, תְּמִימִם.
36.english: but ye shall present a burnt-offering, an offering made by fire, of a sweet savour unto the LORD: one bullock, one ram, seven he-lambs of the first year without blemish;

37.hebrew: מִנְחָתָם וְנִסְכֵּיהֶם, לַפָּר לָאַיִל וְלַכְּבָשִׂים בְּמִסְפָּרָם--כַּמִּשְׁפָּט.
37.english: their meal-offering and their drink-offerings for the bullock, for the ram, and for the lambs, shall be according to their number, after the ordinance;

38.hebrew: וּשְׂעִיר חַטָּאת, אֶחָד; מִלְּבַד עֹלַת הַתָּמִיד, וּמִנְחָתָהּ וְנִסְכָּהּ.
38.english: and one he-goat for a sin-offering; beside the continual burnt-offering, and the meal-offering thereof, and the drink-offering thereof.

39.hebrew: אֵלֶּה תַּעֲשׂוּ לַיהוָה, בְּמוֹעֲדֵיכֶם--לְבַד מִנִּדְרֵיכֶם וְנִדְבֹתֵיכֶם, לְעֹלֹתֵיכֶם וּלְמִנְחֹתֵיכֶם, וּלְנִסְכֵּיכֶם, וּלְשַׁלְמֵיכֶם.
39.english: These ye shall offer unto the LORD in your appointed seasons, beside your vows, and your freewill-offerings, whether they be your burnt-offerings, or your meal-offerings, or your drink-offerings, or your peace-offerings.
